content.rendered:
3-Month Plan entry level

Our Targeted Account Outreach includes daily messages 50/day (Instagrams limit) completely handsfree for you done by our expert in house account managers.

We will be developing your target audience & developing a custom outreach script that we will present to you prior to starting the service! We’re sure you’ll love it and if not we accept unlimited revisions.

This service will bring daily on TARGET leads & followers in the demographic/niche of your choice!

This is key to generating more revenue for yourself & business!
